Interactive Robotics Laboratory

IRL is working to build a low-cost robotic coworker that can assist in workplace tasks and interact with other humans around it.

Summer 2018

Stereo Vision

The goal of this research was to intuitively teach Edwin to recognize and remember objects, thus creating a robust tool for dataset generation.
